entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Nordegg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
